        Returns:
        BigDecimal amount the user entered.

      • accountActionSelection

        public static AccountAction accountActionSelection(UserAccount ua)
        Retrieves an AccountAction from the user.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        AccountAction the user selected.

      • accountSelection

        public static BankAccount accountSelection(UserAccount ua,
                                           BankAccount filter)
        Retrieves bank account selection from user
        Parameters:
        ua - UserAccount to retrieve accounts from.
        filter - BankAccount to filter from selection such as transfer.
        Returns:
        BankAccount user selected.

      • cardSelection

        public static java.lang.String cardSelection()
        Retrieves card selection from user.
        Returns:
        The BankAccount associated with card the user selected.

      • getBank

        public static Bank getBank()
        Retrieves a Bank object.
        Returns:
        Bank containing pre-populated with user accounts and bank accounts.

      • authenticatePIN

        public static boolean authenticatePIN(BankAccount ba)
        Requests user for a PIN to verify they are the owner of account.
        Parameters:
        ba - BankAccount to authenticate
        Returns:
        Boolean if an account becomes locked after 3 unsuccessful attempts or account was previously locked.
